name: MagicPuzzlePro
description:
More than 30 different twisty puzzles types:
🔥 Classic Cube and Pyramid
🔥 Square-1, Square-2, Square-3, and Square-4.
🔥 Mirror Cube, Ghost Cube
🔥 Mirror Dodecahedron, Ghost Dodecahedron
To control puzzle: touch-and-drag on puzzle.
To rotate: touch-and-drag outside the puzzle.
To zoom in/out: 2-fingers scale.
